page.title: 14An Ordinary Day (Cont.)
page.content: cleaning lady two mornings a week who does the bulk of my housework for me, so today I only need to tidy the house and give the rooms a quick vacuum.Washing and ironing is a another matter, the family's laundry takes hours of my time each week.Apart from the household chores I spend quite a lot of my time organising fund rising activities for the children's school associteon of which I am Treasurer.We are currentey in the throes of arranging a whole day's ice skating on synthetic ice which is laid down in the school hall, and the following week we are holding a family Bar.b.Que for all children and their parents and friends. The monies raised go towards buying very necessary equipment for the school which is currently feeling the effects of the present Government's cutbacks in
